price: Shin, kuma ba su gani ba cẽwa Allah na shimfida arziki ga wanda Yake so kuma Yanã ƙuntatãwa? Lalle a cikin wancan akwai ãyõyi ga mutãne mãsu yin ĩmãni.
arabic: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَبۡسُطُ ٱلرِّزۡقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَقۡدِرُۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّقَوۡمٖ يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: awalam yaraw anna al-laha yabsuṭu al-riz'qa liman yashāu wayaqdiru inna fī dhālika laāyātin liqawmin yu'minūna
